item.title: Why K8S?
item.description:
🚀 Kubernetes for Beginners: Why Software Engineers Should Care About It #

📅 Preamble #

Software today isn’t just about writing applications — it’s about running them reliably.
As systems grow larger and more complex, managing applications becomes just as important as building them.
Containers like Docker changed how we package software, but when you have dozens or hundreds of containers, managing them manually becomes overwhelming.
That’s where Kubernetes comes in — a powerful system to automate and scale container management.
